title: Entity Sensor
description: A component that owns multiple subsensors, each one firing an event when a set of conditions are met by other entities within the defined range

relative_range.title: Relative Range
relative_range.description: If true, the subsensors' range is additive on top of the entity's size.

subsensors.title: Subsensors
subsensors.description: The list of subsensors which sense for entities and emit events when all their conditions are met.

cooldown.title: Cooldown
cooldown.description: How many seconds should elapse before the subsensor can once again sense for entities. The cooldown is applied on top of the base 1 tick (0.05 seconds) delay. Negative values will result in no cooldown being used.

maximum_count.title: Maximum Count
maximum_count.description: The maximum number of entities that must pass the filter conditions for the event to send.

minimum_count.title: Minimum Count
minimum_count.description: The minimum number of entities that must pass the filter conditions for the event to send.

range.title: Range
range.description: The maximum horizontal and vertical distance another entity can be from this and have the filters checked against it.

require_all.title: Require All
require_all.description: If true requires all nearby entities to pass the filter conditions for the events to send.
